snippet: KAPLAN--Joyce, nee Gumbiner, passed away on March 4, 2016 at the age of 91. Beloved wife of Howard, mother of Laird, grandmother of Skyler. Aunt of Laurie Stein and her husband Michael Bigley. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KAPLAN--Joyce, nee Gumbiner, passed away on March 4, 2016 at the age of 91. Beloved wife of Howard, mother of Laird, grandmother of Skyler. Aunt of Laurie Stein and her husband Michael Bigley. 1/3
